statements: UPDATE documentation SET doc_title = 'New Title', doc_content = 'New Content' WHERE doc_id = 1;
UPDATE documentation SET doc_content = 'Updated Content', doc_created_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, doc_title = 'Updated Title' WHERE doc_id = 2;
UPDATE documentation SET doc_content = 'Updated content' WHERE doc_id = 1;
UPDATE documentation SET doc_title = 'New Title', doc_created_at = '2023-01-01 08:00:00' WHERE doc_id = 2;
UPDATE documentation SET document_text = 'Updated text' WHERE document_id = 1;
UPDATE runbooks SET runbook_content = 'New content for runbook' WHERE runbook_id = 2;
UPDATE documentation SET document_name = 'Updated Document Name', document_text = 'Updated Document Text' WHERE document_id = 1;
UPDATE runbooks SET runbook_content = 'New Runbook Content', runbook_title = 'Updated Runbook Title' WHERE runbook_id = 2;
UPDATE documentation SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE doc_id = 1;
UPDATE troubleshooting SET resolution = 'Resolved the issue' WHERE troubleshoot_id = 3;
UPDATE documentation SET description='Updated description', author='John Doe' WHERE doc_id = 1
UPDATE troubleshooting SET details='New details', resolution='Fixed resolution', created_by='Jane Smith' WHERE troubleshoot_id = 2
UPDATE documentation SET title='New Title', content='New Content' WHERE id=1
UPDATE documentation SET created_at='2022-01-30 12:00:00' WHERE id=2
UPDATE documentation SET title = 'New Title', content = 'Updated content' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE documentation SET content = 'Revised content', title = 'Revised Title' WHERE created_at < NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY;
UPDATE documentation SET content = 'New Content' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE runbooks SET title = 'Updated Title' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE documentation SET content = 'Updated content for documentation' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE runbooks SET title = 'New Title', steps = 'Step 1, Step 2, Step 3' WHERE id = 2;
